titleStmt.title: An epitaph vpon the death of Richard Price Esquier (the second sonne of Sir Iohn Price Knight, deceased) which Richard left this life the fifth day of Ianuarie, 1586.
titleStmt.author: R. D., fl. 1587.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "My sorrow doth suppresse my memorie,".
The year is probably given in Lady Day dating.
See "The Library", ser. 6, 2:54-57, which includes some speculations on authorship.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
